response.overview: One of the world's most extraordinary criminal organizations, with its claim to be the Mahdi and a strange interpretation of Islam... A brutal system established to reach 100 thousand virgins, which is the sign of the coming of the Mahdi...  The secrets of Adnan Oktar's organization, which destroyed the lives of thousands of people, especially young girls, and was barely brought down after 40 years, are revealed for the first time.  Here is the story of the kitties we made fun of.
response.title: Kedicik
